tourGuide.service

Class UserService

  • java.lang.Object
    • tourGuide.service.UserService

  • @Service
public class UserService
extends java.lang.Object
    UserService contains our collection of users, and performs associated tasks for main TourGuide application Currently, to allow concurrent access we use a ConcurrentMap to store Users. In a real system we would adapt this class to interface with a database or similar storage solution instead

      • addUserReward

        public boolean addUserReward(java.lang.String userName,
                             gpsUtil.location.VisitedLocation visitedLocation,
                             gpsUtil.location.Attraction attraction,
                             int rewardPoints)
        Generate and add a UserReward to a stored User
        Parameters:
        userName - user's userName
        visitedLocation - the location user was tracked at
        attraction - the attraction the reward is for
        rewardPoints - the points to be added
        Returns:
        boolean true if successful, false if user not found
